{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Blaze Cassette |image = [[File:Bag_Blaze_Cassette_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Blaze Cassette''. |dex = 80 |effect = Hatch eggs faster }} The '''Blaze Cassette''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it speeds up the process of [[Pokemon Day Care|hatching]] [[Egg|eggs]]. The Blaze Cassette is unlocked after catching 80 unique Pok√©mon. == Details == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || x1.5 Eggs Hatching Speed || 50 Eggs Hatched || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.6 Eggs Hatching Speed || 50 Eggs Hatched || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.7 Eggs Hatching Speed || 150 Eggs Hatched || style="text-align:right" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.8 Eggs Hatching Speed || 250 Eggs Hatched || style="text-align:right" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.9 Eggs Hatching Speed || 500 Eggs Hatched || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x2.0 Eggs Hatching Speed || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}
